name: Eyegem
description:
The most dangerous creature in the planet needs to be stopped. They are so strong that only the power of the 4 primal gems combined can stop him. Join the gems to damage him and save the planet.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow Keys to move
  • Space to pick/drop gems

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/boss-battle-3-8-bit-re-upload
